name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Sr. Database Engineer, I leverage 9+ years of expertise in database management and software engineering, with a focus on high-performance database solutions. My skills include proficiency in **Oracle Database**, **PostgreSQL**, **Microsoft SQL Server**, **NoSQL**, **MongoDB**, **MySQL**, **Cassandra**, **AWS RDS**, **Azure SQL**, and **Google Cloud SQL**. I excel in automating processes using **Python**, **Bash**, **Shell**, and **PowerShell** while implementing infrastructure as code with **Terraform** and **Ansible**. Additionally, I have a strong background in container orchestration using **Kubernetes** and **Docker**, and monitoring performance through **Prometheus** and **Grafana**. I am dedicated to mentoring junior engineers, leading cross-functional teams, and delivering solutions focused on user experience and innovation.
